description.en: Reference to event object.
description.jp: Reference to event object.

description.en: Fires on a mouse click on the element.
description.jp: Fires on a mouse click on the element.

description.en: Reference to event object.
description.jp: Reference to event object.

description.en: Fires when the mouse pointer moves out of an element.
description.jp: Fires when the mouse pointer moves out of an element.

description.en: Reference to event object.
description.jp: Reference to event object.

description.en: Fires when the mouse pointer moves over an element.
description.jp: Fires when the mouse pointer moves over an element.

innerHTML.description: The display text of the link.

href.description: Specifies the location of the linked document.

media.description: Specifies on what device the linked document will be displayed.

rel.description: Specifies the relationship between the current document and the linked document.

description.en: Links to an alternate version of the document (i.e. print page, translated or mirror). Example: <link rel="alternate" type="application/atom+xml" title="W3Schools News" href="/blog/news/atom">.
description.jp: Links to an alternate version of the document (i.e. print page, translated or mirror). Example: <link rel="alternate" type="application/atom+xml" title="W3Schools News" href="/blog/news/atom">.

description.en: Links to the author of the document.
description.jp: Links to the author of the document.

description.en: Permanent URL used for bookmarking.
description.jp: Permanent URL used for bookmarking.

description.en: Links to a help document.
description.jp: Links to a help document.

description.en: Links to copyright information for the document.
description.jp: Links to copyright information for the document.

description.en: Links to an unendorsed document, like a paid link. ("nofollow" is used by Google, to specify that the Google search spider should not follow that link).
description.jp: Links to an unendorsed document, like a paid link. ("nofollow" is used by Google, to specify that the Google search spider should not follow that link).

description.en: Specifies that the browser should not send a HTTP referer header if the user follows the hyperlink.
description.jp: Specifies that the browser should not send a HTTP referer header if the user follows the hyperlink.

description.en: Indicates that the document is a part of a series, and that the next document in the series is the referenced document.
description.jp: Indicates that the document is a part of a series, and that the next document in the series is the referenced document.

description.en: Specifies that the target resource should be cached.
description.jp: Specifies that the target resource should be cached.

description.en: Indicates that the document is a part of a series, and that the previous document in the series is the referenced document.
description.jp: Indicates that the document is a part of a series, and that the previous document in the series is the referenced document.

description.en: Links to a search tool for the document.
description.jp: Links to a search tool for the document.

description.en: A tag (keyword) for the current document.
description.jp: A tag (keyword) for the current document.

type.description: Specifies the MIME type of the linked document.

description.en: Specifies where to open the linked document
description.jp: Specifies where to open the linked document

description.en: Loads the response in a new window/tab.
description.jp: Loads the response in a new window/tab.

description.en: Loads the response in the same frame.
description.jp: Loads the response in the same frame.

description.en: Loads the response in the parent frame.
description.jp: Loads the response in the parent frame.

description.en: Loads the response in the full body of the window.
description.jp: Loads the response in the full body of the window.

description.en: Specifies an inline CSS style for an element.
description.jp: Specifies an inline CSS style for an element.

description.en: Specifies extra information about an element.
description.jp: Specifies extra information about an element.
